goals__remit: Green Street Advisors aims to be the leading independent research provider on listed real estate companies globally. Our European office focuses on the European market. We are un-conflicted: we do not engage in investment banking activities, nor do we engage in proprietary trading activities or asset management. We are fully focused on servicing our clients with high quality research and execution capabilities.
